name: Templar_ East
text: Pizza was a little under cooked and was way to much sauce, I think I'll stick to Jets and Papa Johns from now on. Was fast though for a Friday Night pick up order (15 minutes).

name: Ashlee
text: This is what you get when you order wings that's supposed to have sauce on them. Pizzas are dry and cheese gets overcooked.

name: Madison Blake
text: Fast delivery.   Pizza made as ordered.

name: Ed Krause
text: We arrived at this spot for dinner. we heard about this place from many people.  Well, we were not disappointed. The staff members welcomed us with a smile and we felt excellent. The meal was delicious. We had a great time and we will definitely return to this restaurant. Warmly recommended.

name: Tim Hall
text: Good pizza always makes by Tammy

name: Randy Moffit
text: Had a great experience in this spot with my kid. The food arrives fast and the customer service is just fantastic. Prices are convenient.

name: Edward Castelli
text: The menu and service were beyond our expectations. We really enjoyed the ambience of this place. Amazing restaurant to take the family out for dinner.

name: Carlos Parton
text: The food and service were ahead of my expectations. I truly loved the ambience of this spot. Excellent spot to take my family out for lunch.

name: Beth Frotton
text: Cold pizza. Delayed order. Incorrect order.  Poor customer service.

name: Jerry Harmon
text: This spot clearly knows how to please their clients. Constantly with a kind attitude. The food is fairly priced, always flavorful and neat.

name: Marvin Palermo
text: Fantastic and tasty food, I love the vibes this place has, and the cashiers were helpful. I will definitely visit here again.

name: Vicky Lukumina
text: Very deliceous.

name: James Campbell
text: Best pizza

name: Inman Woman
text: The employees are always friendly and they have good deals. Unfortunately, they changed the P'zone when they brought it back, so I'll no longer be ordering those and I just read an article that they just changed their pan pizza too. Very disappointed.

name: Rachelle Le Roy
text: Always friendly & always made well! Both pick up and delivery experiences have been nice.

name: HETFIELD
text: I go here once a week or every other week. Saturday will be the last for awhile. I ended up in bed with food poisoning. Its been three days. Unfortunately it couldn't have been something else that I ate.

name: Tabitha Eldridge
text: We got old food, I called and complained the manger even told me the food was old and apologized. Not only gave me a credit (which is all I expected) but gave me double my credit for all my troubles. I called later that night to order food, ‚Ä¶More

name: M Q
text: Ordered 2 pizzas from this location and had to be the worse pizza we ever had.   Both were extremely dry and over cooked.  When I went to pick the pizzas up, I was the only customer in the store and still had to wait 15 min before I was acknowledged and waited on.  CONSUMER BEWARE!!

name: Esmerae Lillywing
text: Great food, the pan crust is our fave. Fast to arrive on delivery and friendly people! Love the point system and the online/mobile tracker!!!

name: Celina Quay
text: I order from here often.   I have gotten my order late without even realizing it until I received an email with a free coupon to make up for it.   Top notch customer service.   Any issues I have had have been fixed promptly and without a hitch.

name: Justin Vicars
text: Great pizza, definitely recommend the pan crust and the hut favorite crust flavor.

name: Austin Patton
text: I wouldn't even give them half a star. Nobody seemed to know what they were doing. Waited 25 minutes after my scheduled pick up time while others got there after I did and walked right out with their food. I dont understand how this location is still in business.

name: Tammy Buck
text: I placed and paid online for my order and was given a estimated delivery time of 40 minutes(10pm). It was a rainy Friday night. I waited a hour....no delivery. I called the restaurant a few minutes before 11pm and was informed my food was ‚Ä¶More

text: We love Pizza Hut, but I feel my pizza was cold by the time it got here.

text: I've been ordering here for a few years now and have never had a problem. My food is always accurate, fresh and delicious. The deals when ordering online always come in handy and the workers are nice also.

name: Mandy Marie
text: I order from Pizza Hunt only a few times a year. My experience thus far has been good. I away carryout so I'm not sure about the delivery service. I dislike that extra cheese isn't considered a topping though.
